title: Given velocity, analyze particle motion part - b

content.description: A particle moves along the x-axis so that at any time t >0 its velocity is given by v(t)=t lnt−t . At time t=1 , the position of the particle is x(1)=6 .
content.question: For what values of t is the particle moving to the right?

frqParts.text: For what values of t is the particle moving to the right?

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
